## v0.1.0

Initial release.

- 12-step build pipeline producing HTML, markdown, RSS, sitemap, search index, and LLM discovery files
- 6 bundled themes: default, minimal, dark, docs, brutalist, bento
- AI agent via Claude Code â€” `page agent` spawns Claude with full site context
- Multi-language (i18n) support with per-language URLs, RSS feeds, sitemaps, and hreflang tags
- Deploy to GitHub Pages, Cloudflare Pages, and Netlify with guided setup and pre-flight checks
- Image processing: auto-resize, WebP conversion, srcset, lazy loading
- Pagination, tag pages, table of contents, excerpts, reading time
- Custom domain management for all deploy targets
- Interactive dev server with REPL and live reload
- Shell installer for macOS and Linux
